definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: push, press (perh. related, by transp., to Ar. farad.a appoint, prescribe, As. parṣu, command, cf. Ba:ZMG xliii (1889), 188);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּפְחַר־]] Ge 19:3 +, 3 mpl. [[וַיִּפְחְרוּ]] v:Ge 19:9, 2Ki 2:17; —push, press, upon ([[ב]] pers.) physically Ge 19:2; = urge v:Ge 19:3, Ge 33:11, Ju Jdg 19:7, 2Ki 2:17, + inf. 2Ki 5:16; read also prob. [[וַיִּפְחַר־בּוֹ]] 2Sa 13:25, 2Sa 13:27, 2Ki 5:23 (for [[וַיִּפְרָץ־]]), [[וַיִּפְחְרוּ־בוֹ]] 1Sa 28:23 (for [[וַיִּפְרְחוּ־]]), Tanchum (cf. The), Weir in Dr:1Sa 28:23 Kit:id. Bu HPS Löhr.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf. abs. [[הַפְחַָר]] 1Sa 15:23 to display pushing (i.e. arrogance, presumption; ‖[[êֶמרִי]]; cf. Dr).
